name: sync-in
description: Sync-in is a self-hosted collaborative note editor with real-time shared pads. Itâ€™s a modern take on Etherpad for teams and classrooms.
features: Real-time collaboration: Edits documents simultaneously with multiple users.
Shared pads: Creates collaborative text documents accessible via unique URLs.
Live cursors: Shows other users' cursor positions and selections in real-time.
Version history: Tracks document changes with timeline and rollback capability.
Rich text editing: Formats text with bold, italic, lists, and other styling.
Export options: Downloads pads as plain text, HTML, or Markdown.
Access control: Protects pads with passwords or restricts to specific users.
Chat sidebar: Discusses changes with collaborators via built-in chat.
Syntax highlighting: Supports code editing with language-specific highlighting.
Mobile responsive: Edits documents from smartphones and tablets.
No registration: Creates and shares pads without requiring accounts.
Offline editing: Continues editing when offline with automatic sync on reconnect.
